attributes.action: Add Prison Staff to the top priority list for the COVID-19 vaccine.
attributes.additional_details:
Prison staff are the only possible carriers of COVID-19 inside our establishments, as all new prisoners are tested on arrival

Looking at statistics of COVID-19 in UK prisons  4,800 prisoners have contracted COVID-19 and at least 71 prisoners have died since the start of the pandemic.

In December alone there had been 2,400 positive cases of COVID-19, a rise of nearly 70% in a month.

With Prison staff isolating due to COVID managing a prison/prisoners will increase in difficulty.
attributes.background: Prison staff need to be added to the top priority list for the COVID-19 vaccine along side other emergency services and keyworkers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567308
